__construct.name: __construct

parent.name: check
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

get_cron.name: get_cron
get_cron.summary: Returns the full row as an indexed array for the given CRON ID.

is_timeout.name: is_timeout

start.name: start
start.summary: Writes in the given CRON row the next start time, the current as previous, and the new running status.

finish.name: finish
finish.summary: Writes in the given CRON row the duration and the new finished status.

get_next_date.name: get_next_date
get_next_date.summary: Returns a SQL date for the next event given a frequency and a time to count from (now if 0).

arguments.name: frequency
arguments.description: A string made of 1 letter (i, h, d, w, m, or y) and a number.

arguments.name: from_time
arguments.description: time A SQL formatted date which will be the base of the operation.

get_next.name: get_next
get_next.summary: Returns the whole row for the next CRON to be executed from now if there is any.

get_running_rows.name: get_running_rows

get_next_rows.name: get_next_rows

get_failed.name: get_failed

activate.name: activate
activate.summary: Sets the active column to 1 for the given CRON ID.

deactivate.name: deactivate
deactivate.summary: Sets the active column to 0 for the given CRON ID.

set_pid.name: set_pid
set_pid.summary: Sets the active column to 1 for the given CRON ID.

unset_pid.name: unset_pid
unset_pid.summary: Sets the active column to 0 for the given CRON ID.

add.name: add

add_single.name: add_single

edit.name: edit

test.name: test
test.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: test
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

__call.name: __call

parent.name: __call

get_pid_path.name: get_pid_path

get_log_path.name: get_log_path

get_log_tree.name: get_log_tree

get_day_logs.name: get_day_logs

get_log_prev_next.name: get_log_prev_next

get_last_logs.name: get_last_logs

get_last_log.name: get_last_log

is_active.name: is_active
is_active.summary: Returns true if the file data_folder/.active exists, false otherwise.

is_cron_active.name: is_cron_active
is_cron_active.summary: Returns true if the file data_folder/.cron exists, false otherwise.

is_poll_active.name: is_poll_active
is_poll_active.summary: Returns true if the file data_folder/.poll exists, false otherwise.
